articles.title: Login
articles.description: Issues with signing in, password reset

content.text: If you are having trouble logging in, please check your credentials and try again. You can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.
To edit your profile, go to the settings page and update your information. You can change your display name, profile picture, and bio.
You can customize the appearance of the application by choosing different themes and toggling dark mode in the settings.
Create a new board to organize your tasks and projects. You can set permissions and add initial content to get started.
Analyze your data with the built-in analytics dashboard. View key metrics and generate reports to track your progress.
